TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted. But all 3 rockets are now gonna destroy your house.

I wish for A locomotive,to drive with my mind.

Granted, but it doesn't fit any railway gauge in existence, and the loco can't be regauged.

I wish for High Speed 2 to be completed on time, under budget, and perform above expectations.

Granted, but you move to Africa before it's completed.

I wish there was peace in the Middle East.

Granted. The Middle East unifies into an internally peaceful state bent on raising oil prices by 10x.

I wish for a mild winter here this year.

Granted. Mild hot sauce falls from the sky instead of snow.

I wish people would hate Frozen LESS.

Granted. They hate mud more, though.

I wish for less than 50cm of total snowfall this winter.

what rest of the planets

I wish for aliens

Granted, ONLY your house gets covered with 12 feet of snow.

I wish for a dog

Granted. You bought it off this huge guy who called it "Fluffy" and it has a surfeit of heads. In an unfortunate coincidence you lose all musical ability.

I wish my backup would finish already.

granted, but your computer explodes once it starts

I wish I had great mod creating abilities
Granted. But even though your mods are technically excellent, visually stunning, and exactly what people are asking for, for some reason they just never become popular.

You get an ostrich inside your living room!

I wish the user below me had an ostrich in their living room as well.

Granted. The user below you fends it off and mails it to you.

I wish that the Philae lander was successful.

Granted. But people immediately forgot about it.

I wish I have a million dollar house that is no where near Vancouver.

Granted. However, the house immediately burns down, and the only available house for the remainder of your budget is right in the middle of Vancouver.

I wish for Fallout 4.

Granted. It's in Pakistan and the CIA mistake it for an Al Qaeda safehouse and blow it up.

EDIT: Ninja'd, but eh, same corruption

I wish monitor settings were less complicated.

Granted. All monitors are now 320x240@30Hz in 4 colors.

I wish for a high resolution 30" monitor.

Granted. But it's only compatible with Windows Vista.

I wish my house didn't get so darn dusty.

Granted. Your fish tank breaks, and your house is now full of mud. Good luck with that.

I wish Disney Pixar made a good sequel to Frozen.

Granted Pixar makes a sequal (even though they didn't make the first one, Dreamworks did), and it is good for you, so it is 2 hours of Elsa/Anna struggling in mud. The movie is a flop and pixar goes bankrupt.

I wish MrMuddyBoots was less obsessed with mud

Granted. The obsession is removed and transferred to you.

I wish my work building had something resembling even heating throughout.

Granted. it resembles even heating, but all the heat is transfered directly to your office/workplace, so that it is over 200 degrees celsius there, but only 3 above absolute 0

I wish that I had a computer that could run KSP

Granted. They hate mud more, though.

I wish for less than 50cm of total snowfall this winter.

What?! 50 cm of snow!

...anyway

Granted, but the computer gets hacked the day after you get it.

I wish to not be so lazy.

Granted, you work/exercise so much your heart bursts.

I wish for all of my favorite mods to be added stock, with no extra lag
